How was your experience\nwith us? Turbo VPN App Feedback
1. How to use Turbo VPN? 2. How long can I use Turbo VPN for each connection? 3. Why "can't" I use internet after connection established? 4. How to disable battery optimization for Turbo VPN? 5. What is Smart Proxy? 6. When I try to connect, Android system request a permission, but I can not accept it, why?
Click connect button in the main screen to use Turbo VPN. If Android system show a dialog to request a connection permission, click OK or Accept to continue. As long as you can. We don/t set time or traffic limition on each connection Fist of all, check your network connection. Then make sure "you've" disabled battery optimization for Turbo VPN in "Android's" battery setting (which means enable background activity for Turbo VPN). If you enable Smart Proxy, you also need to make sure all the apps you need to proxy is checked in Smart Proxy setting.
On Android 5.0 or above, you can only enable some of the apps to use Turbo VPN to proxy traffic, and all the other apps use local network. For example, if Facebook and Skype are blocked in your country, make them checked in Smart Proxy. After the VPN connection is established, only Facebook and "Skype's" traffic go through VPN, and all your other apps will perform as good as usual. You may be running some app which changes the screen color or opens a floating window. "Android's" security system prevent VPN to be running under these cases. You need close this kind of app temporarily to continue.
Turbo VPN is new and Enhanced with Several Security Upgrades. Our Aim to Provide best VPN service to our customers. Turbo VPN is also Super Secure VPN with Unlimited Proxy Server for lifetime free access. Unlock any websites save your device Turbo VPN is the most trusted security, privacy and access platform with top performance on speed, stability and security to unblock sites, unblock any apps or websites, access social networks, watch videos and movies, protect Wi-Fi hotspot security and protect privacy
